column1: Heading to drop off your ballots at your polling place like https://t.co/DQn9Ih1YsH

Striking down protections for folks with pre-exisiting conditions? Selling off our public lands? Talk about spooky!  Even scarier? Letting this election slip by without ensuring your voice is heard.  Every vote counts. Drop off your ballot now.
7 days out mood. Let’s get after it.  😎 https://t.co/s6Wu2LC3UC

I'm proud to endorse @shanemorigeau as Montana's next State Auditor. Shane knows what it takes to hold folks accountable and protect Montana consumers. Help support Shane here: https://t.co/4Ye1WvHzGC https://t.co/kdzwkgm75P

As a legislator Tom Woods worked across the aisle to get things done for Montana. I'm proud to endorse Tom for Montana's Public Service Commission—he's got what it takes to push the PSC into the future with some much-needed commonsense. Support Tom today: https://t.co/D9sQKlhdQt https://t.co/nAC6iUkjAA
Proud to join @stevebullockmt @WilliamsForMT @CooneyforMT @Casey_Schreiner and @sallyjewell on #NationalPublicLandsDay to talk about how we #KeepItPublic.

As my folks used to say "We're only renting this place." It's our duty to ensure our public lands are protected maintained and around for the next generation. You can bet that Montana Democrats are up to the task.

The stakes of this election couldn't be higher—are you ready to vote this fall?   Check your registration status request your ballot and make a plan to vote today.   Find everything you need to ensure your voice is heard at https://t.co/3lpHXPcapw. #NationalVoterRegistrationDay

I am endorsing Monica Tranel for Public Service Commission. She will bring needed common sense and leadership to the job.   Help @TranelforPSC by donating here: https://t.co/ivrQB5kpwZ https://t.co/iikWmDJsK6

I'm proud to endorse my friend @MelissaRomanoMT as Montana's next Superintendent of Public Instruction. Melissa is a proven leader in education and knows what our kids need to succeed. Help Melissa continue to fight for Montana students by donating here: https://t.co/betQJ3mwUa https://t.co/EW7bmYrNcU

Mike Cooney proves exactly why he's the right pick for MT's next Governor—he'll be a strong advocate for our farmers and ranchers and all folks who call rural Montana home.   Great to be with you @CooneyforMT! https://t.co/qkiEnenSHA
Thanks @WilliamsForMT! Can't wait to have you as Montana's next Congresswoman! https://t.co/dOgOmn125L
Please join me at tonight’s Rural Communities for @JoeBiden Convention Watch Party to talk about why Joe is the right person to help move rural America forward. Register here: https://t.co/NZ4sPFKKGp

My friend @KamalaHarris is a proven fighter and an excellent pick for Vice President. As VP I'm confident she will continue to fight for working families across this country. Looking forward to supporting her and @JoeBiden in November. https://t.co/37exYwfVcP
Can confirm. https://t.co/BfzbZRCcQ0

From Sidney to Eureka a record number of Montanans made their voices heard in yesterday's primary election. As we head into November I'm proud to stand with our Dem candidates in the fight for working folks our public lands and more affordable health care. Let's do this!
Please join me in supporting @brycebennett for Montana Secretary of State. We can count on him to stand up for Montana values.  https://t.co/Ouj5m21YvI https://t.co/LVht1tQE8h
I am supporting @JoeBiden for President because he will stand up for hardworking families and bring this country together. https://t.co/pmJC3qjqdF
Happy birthday to my good friend @GovernorBullock! Grateful for your leadership and service to the Treasure State! https://t.co/Ixu3JrL5gD

Washington needs more Montana common sense and I know my friend @stevebullockmt has got it. His track record shows he’s a proven fighter for the folks in our state and can work across the aisle to get real results. https://t.co/eqjjivO4SG
